Class TSpinner

  • java.lang.Object
    • jexer.TWidget
      • jexer.TSpinner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<TWidget>

    public class TSpinner
extends TWidget
    TSpinner implements a simple up/down spinner.
